== Ubuntu Global Jam Maverick Cycle ==
Ubuntu has held a Global Jam for the last few releases, and have scheduled one for the weekend of 27th to 29th August. This is first time we are participating, so we should do so this release cycle!

=== Where ? ===
* Systemum : 128 Bd Lahcen Ouidder, Angle Bd de la RÃ©sistance 20500, Casablanca. <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/venues/156/detail/]]</nowiki>

=== When ? ===
* Sat, 28 Aug. 2010 22:00 - 03:30 +0000

=== Prerequisites ===
* Launchpad Account
* Install the gobby package "sudo apt-get install gobby".

=== Attendees ===
* Add your self to the list <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/266/detail/]]</nowiki>
